descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------A RINKU95 MOD----------------------------------------------
Sorry my bad english

)This is a mod to improve vampirism on Skyrim.The changes respect the original vampirism are:

-Vampire drain improved(8,10,12 and 14 per stage)
-Vampire servant:You can have a servant with any level for 1 day.
-Vampires have now 10% extra life and do 5% melee damage more.

How to install :

Extract the content in to the data folder.

REPORT ANY BUG PLEASE
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Rinku95
